content:
Hey, I stayed inactive in my other account, and now, when trying to log in, I get this message:
"Your account is no longer active. Please contact your organization administrator to reactivate it."
Is there any way someone could remove deactivated account for e-mail "marcospb19@hotmail.com"?
(I'm just afraid I run out of e-mails to participate hehe, I did nothing wrong, just stayed inactive)

João M. Bezerra said:

Hey, I stayed inactive in my other account, and now, when trying to log in, I get this message:
"Your account is no longer active. Please contact your organization administrator to reactivate it."

@simulacrum is it possible to reactivate my other user?

simulacrum said:

done, I believe

Thanks! It worked! (I would additionally suggest removing that option, because it blocks people from rejoining).
I'm not aware of the option so if you have a pointer to docs, that'd be great
I thought it existed, but could not find it too O.o, maybe there's just no way
